item.title: RDCOMClient Part 7 - [["Value"]] vs [["Text"]]
item.description: This post will be a bit shorter than usual, but I thought it could be useful to highlight a potential ‘gotcha’ that could cause problems for newcomers to RDCOMClient. A Range object includes several properties, including Value and Text. What’s the difference between between Value and Text? The help page explains things quite well. Basically there’s two differences. Firstly, if your specified Range object covers multiple cells, the Text property will only return the value in the first cell.
